name: Madness combat Fan-Game
description:
this my game's prototypes, beta's, demo's, and the full game
(oh yeah this is  based off of the animation called madness combat by Krinkels)
i also made this on scratch because I'm not good at coding on unity and stuff

W A S D to move left click to interact (if your hand is touching a interactable object) and f (if you have a weapon) to Focus

Scratch link https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/515789036
